LEFT JOIN sys_user u1 ON u1.id = a.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.id = a.update_by LEFT JOIN sys_user u3 ON u3.id = a.service_user LEFT JOIN t_property_project pp on pp.id = a.property_project_id LEFT JOIN t_building tb on tb.id = a.building_id left JOIN t_attachment atta on atta.house_id = a.id

SELECT
FROM t_house a LEFT JOIN sys_user u1 ON u1.id = a.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.id = a.update_by LEFT JOIN sys_user u3 ON u3.id = a.service_user LEFT JOIN t_property_project pp on pp.id = a.property_project_id LEFT JOIN t_building tb on tb.id = a.building_id left JOIN t_attachment atta on atta.house_id = a.id WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT h.id, HOUSE_CODE, h.rental, h.short_desc, h.short_location, h.pay_way, a.attachment_path, h.DECORA_STRUC_ROOM_NUM, h.DECORA_STRUC_CUSSPAC_NUM, h.DECORA_STRUC_WASHRO_NUM, h.HOUSE_SPACE, h.HOUSE_FLOOR, '' ORIENTATION, p.PROJECT_ADDR FROM t_house h LEFT JOIN t_attachment a ON h.id = a.house_id LEFT JOIN T_PROPERTY_PROJECT p ON h.PROPERTY_PROJECT_ID = p.id WHERE h.id = #{id})t1 UNION ALL SELECT * FROM (SELECT r.id, CONCAT(house_code, '-', room_no) house_code, r.rental, r.short_desc, r.short_location, r.pay_way, a.attachment_path, h.DECORA_STRUC_ROOM_NUM, h.DECORA_STRUC_CUSSPAC_NUM, h.DECORA_STRUC_WASHRO_NUM, r.ROOM_SPACE HOUSE_SPACE, h.HOUSE_FLOOR, r.ORIENTATION, p.PROJECT_ADDR FROM t_room r LEFT JOIN t_attachment a ON r.id = a.room_id LEFT JOIN t_house h ON r.HOUSE_ID = h.id LEFT JOIN T_PROPERTY_PROJECT p ON h.PROPERTY_PROJECT_ID = p.id WHERE r.id = #{id})t2
select h.id house_id, '' room_id from t_house h where h.id=#{id} union all select r.house_id, r.id room_id from t_room r where r.id=#{id}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT h.id, HOUSE_CODE, h.rental, h.short_desc, h.short_location, h.pay_way, a.attachment_path FROM t_house h LEFT JOIN t_attachment a ON h.id = a.house_id WHERE h.intent_mode = '0' AND h.is_feature = '1' AND h.house_status = '1' AND h.del_flag = '0') t1 UNION ALL SELECT * FROM (SELECT r.id, CONCAT(h.house_code, '-', room_no) house_code, r.rental, r.short_desc, r.short_location, r.pay_way, a.attachment_path FROM t_room r LEFT JOIN t_house h ON r.house_id = h.id LEFT JOIN t_attachment a ON r.id = a.room_id WHERE r.is_feature = '1' AND r.room_status = '1' AND r.del_flag = '0') t2

SELECT a.id AS "id", a.property_project_id AS "propertyProject.id", a.building_id AS "building.id", a.owner_id AS "owner.id", a.house_no AS "houseNo", a.house_code AS "houseCode", a.house_status AS "houseStatus", a.house_floor AS "houseFloor", a.house_space AS "houseSpace", a.decoration_spance AS "decorationSpance", a.is_feature as "isFeature", a.rental as "rental", a.short_desc as "shortDesc", a.short_location as "shortLocation", a.pay_way as "payWay" FROM t_house a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.property_project_id = #{propertyProject.id} AND a.building_id = #{building.id} AND a.house_no = #{houseNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_house( id, property_project_id, building_id, house_code, house_no, certificate_no, house_floor, house_space, decoration_spance, ORI_STRUC_ROOM_NUM, ORI_STRUC_CUSSPAC_NUM, ORI_STRUC_WASHRO_NUM, DECORA_STRUC_ROOM_NUM, DECORA_STRUC_CUSSPAC_NUM, DECORA_STRUC_WASHRO_NUM, house_status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, intent_mode, is_feature, rental, short_desc, short_location, pay_way, service_user ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{propertyProject.id}, #{building.id}, #{houseCode}, #{houseNo}, #{certificateNo}, #{houseFloor}, #{houseSpace}, #{decorationSpance}, #{oriStrucRoomNum}, #{oriStrucCusspacNum}, #{oriStrucWashroNum}, #{decoraStrucRoomNum}, #{decoraStrucCusspacNum}, #{decoraStrucWashroNum}, #{houseStatus}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{intentMode}, #{isFeature}, #{rental}, #{shortDesc}, #{shortLocation}, #{payWay}, #{serviceUser.id} )
